badges.title: Oregon TCP Trail Survivor
badges.description: Awarded for running a RustChain validator on an Apple II with TCP/IP capability. You didn't just reach the frontier — you staked it over a serial bus and nobody died of dysentery.

emotional_resonance.trigger: Validator executed over TCP stack on Apple II-class hardware

badges.visual_anchor: 8-bit wagon floating over ASCII TCP stream with flame on its flag
